name: Samurai’sPath
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: samurais path
des: In the tumultuous world of feudal Japan, you are a ronin—a masterless samurai—seeking your place in a nation torn by war. Will you uphold the samurai code, serve a lord, or forge your own path? Engage in duels, navigate complex political intrigues, and decide whether to follow honor or survive at any cost. Your decisions will shape your legacy. Drop us any feedback at support@stokedskills.com. We love to hear from our users!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
